hero.title: Discover the Synergy Between Medical and Tourism in Malaysia
hero.description: Join us for the grand launch of Malaysia Year of Medical Tourism 2026 (MYMT2026) this 24th July 2025, a national movement towards becoming the medical tourism destination of choice.

meta.title: MYMT 2026
meta.description: Join the grand launch of Malaysia Year of Medical Tourism 2026 (MYMT2026) on 24th July 2025. Discover the synergy between medical and tourism in Malaysia.
